name: Derek Knight
body:
derek.a.knight@icloud.com | [github.com/dknigh00](https://www.github.com/dknigh00) | [linkedin.com/in/derekaknight](https://www.linkedin.com/in/derekaknight)

Solutions-driven developer with a record of commended performance in modular and object-oriented programming. Knowledgeable about the software development lifecycle, with a working knowledge of algorithms and data structures. Proven success in engineering customized solutions improving business processes, operations and profitability. Skills have been applied in all roles post graduation.

#EDUCATION

####2010 - 2013
##B.S. – Computer Programming – University of Arkansas
*All course work was applied and not theoretical.
*Project Leader for five individual projects including: a help-desk system, a Java MVC blog system, and a Cobol student registration system
*Java and C++ application development and testing
*Developed and configured Oracle and MySql databases.
*Project management using SDLC life cycle

##PERSONAL PROJECTS
####Current
###Syntax Commenting
*Adding Commenting to projects I find helpful on GitHub. This is done within all my known Languages to further my understanding of them.

####2015 - Current
###Terminal Session Manager
*Develop scripts with Python to allow for better management of devices
*Developing a telnet session management client using Python, Java, C, Swift, and XML for mobile devices to allow remote access remotely.

####2015 - Current
###Learning A Full Stack
*Node.js, Angular.js, MongoDB, HTML5,CSS3


#WORK HISTORY

####2013-Current
###Network Engineer / Systems Analyst – Baldor Electric
*Created and modified Python Scripts.
*Used Linux tools to include brew, cask, pip, bash, git
*Managed RESTful API [Cisco Prime Infrastructure](https://developer.cisco.com/site/prime-infrastructure/)


2007-2009
###IT Manager– – U.S. Marine Corps

2005-2007
###Systems Administrator– U.S. Marine Corps

2004-2005
###Helpdesk Support – U.S. Marine Corps
